name: Tori Codes
author: Alvin Muthui

sections.description: Tori Codes provides an easier way to add QR codes to your site and display them using shortcodes. Also, one can use a single QR code on multiple pages/posts by adding the QR shortcode to the desired pages or posts.
sections.installation:
1. Upload toric.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Place <?php do_action('plugin_name_hook'); ?> in your templates
sections.faq:
How to add a QR code

Go to WordPress Admin-> All Codes, filling in the info then copy the shortcode and place it in your page.
sections.changelog:
1.0.0

  • The beginning of Tori Codes.

1.0.1

Added live preview while editing the code value.

short_description: Tori Codes adds QR barcodes to your site with ease. Provides UI to edit the QR content and display it on numerous pages using a shortcode.
description: Tori Codes provides an easier way to add QR codes to your site and display them using shortcodes. Also, one can use a single QR code on multiple pages/posts by adding the QR shortcode to the desired pages or posts.

upgrade_notice.1.0.1: Added live preview while editing the code value.
